alert.note: Alert for Sheridan; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 2:41PM CST until March 05 at 6:00PM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches with the highest amounts along the Pine Ridge. Ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Sheridan and Western Cherry Counties. * WHEN...From midnight CST /11 PM MST/ tonight to 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on very slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will begin as rain, then transition to a wintry mix and eventually all snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.
